name: Laplace no Ma
description:
Laplace’s Demon is a horror RPG with a Lovecraftian bent for the NEC PC-8801 and NEC PC-9801. The game was also ported to Sharp X68000, MSX, the SNES and TurboGrafx-CD.

Set in the fictional town of Newcam, Massachusetts in 1924, the player and several paranormal investigators look into some disturbing rumors surrounding a mansion on the outskirts of town.
